name: Tramposillu
description:
Tramposillu (“Little Cheater”) is a touchscreen-based, four-player party game, where players must try to force others to lift their fingers from the screen while avoiding lifting their own finger.

The trick is that there are no other rules. You can tickle them. Push them. Maybe even shove them. How about licking their hands?

Anything goes! You can cheat as much as you want!

But, please, play nice! We are not responsible for any broken phone.

Or broken friendship.

Please get in touch if you have any feedback, issues, or questions, and we’ll try and help.

Thanks for playing!
